title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Crisp pancetta in a pan; remove from heat.
Whisk eggs, yolk, cheese, and pepper in a bowl.
Toss hot pasta with pancetta and fat; add egg mixture off heat.
Loosen with pasta water; finish with more cheese and pepper.
